cn.vszone.gamepad

接口 OnPlayerListener


  • public interface OnPlayerListener
    作者:
    GeLiang

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void OnPlayerEnter(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player)
      有手柄接入 其中player.id 对应P1 P2 P3 P4...
      void OnPlayerExit(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player)
      有手柄拔出
      boolean onPlayerKeyEvent(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player, KeyEvent ev)
      手柄按键事件的输入
      一次按键事件分为按下和松开
      分别用ev.getAction()==KeyEvent.ACTION_DOWN/KeyEvent.ACTION_UP表示
      常见按键事件说明
       [上] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_UP
      [下] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_DOWN
      [左] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_LEFT
      [右] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_RIGHT
      [A] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_A
      [B] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_B
      [X] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_X
      [Y] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_Y
      [SELECT] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_SELECT
      [START] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_START
      [L1] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_L1
      [R1] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_R1
      boolean onPlayerMotionEvent(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player, MotionEvent ev)
      手柄摇杆事件的输入
      常见摇杆事件通常转为按键事件处理

    • 方法详细资料

      • OnPlayerEnter

        void OnPlayerEnter(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player)
        有手柄接入 其中player.id 对应P1 P2 P3 P4...
        参数:
        player -

      • OnPlayerExit

        void OnPlayerExit(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player)
        有手柄拔出
        参数:
        player -

      • onPlayerMotionEvent

        boolean onPlayerMotionEvent(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player,
                          MotionEvent ev)
        手柄摇杆事件的输入
        常见摇杆事件通常转为按键事件处理
        参数:
        player - 手柄相关信息
        ev - 摇杆事件
        返回:
        是否消耗这个事件
        另请参阅:
        cn.vszone.gamepad.utils.Joystick2DpadEvent和示例程序

      • onPlayerKeyEvent

        boolean onPlayerKeyEvent(cn.vszone.gamepad.bean.Player player,
                       KeyEvent ev)
        手柄按键事件的输入
        一次按键事件分为按下和松开
        分别用ev.getAction()==KeyEvent.ACTION_DOWN/KeyEvent.ACTION_UP表示
        常见按键事件说明
         [上] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_UP
        [下] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_DOWN
        [左] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_LEFT
        [右] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_DPAD_RIGHT
        [A] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_A
        [B] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_B
        [X] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_X
        [Y] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_Y
        [SELECT] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_SELECT
        [START] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_START
        [L1] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_L1
        [R1] ev.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.KEYCODE_BUTTON_R1
        参数:
        player - 手柄相关信息
        ev - 按键事件
        返回:
        是否消耗这个事件
